abstracts.cdata!:
This proposed teacher training project
            will attempt to improve the planning, management and
            delivery of the national teacher training programs and
            reduce the costs of the teaching force. The development of
            high quality cost effective teacher training programs is
            expected to have a significant impact on the quality of
            education. To achieve these objectives the proposed project
            hopes to: 1) improve the administration and planning
            capabilities of the Directorate of Teacher Training through
            the training of directorate staff and the introduction of an
            appropriate information system; 2) improve the quality,
            efficiency and cost effectiveness of the primary teacher
            training system through training of administrative and
            teaching staff and by establishing a trainer training
            program for primary teachers.  The project further aims to
            (3) increase the supply of qualified Yemeni primary teachers
            by establishing five new primary teacher training institutes
            (PTTIs) and relocating and expanding one PTTI; and, 4)
            assist the Faculty of Education (FOE), Sanaa University,
            train its education faculty and improve its teaching
            facilities, and develop a long-term strategy for secondary
            school teacher training.
